name: Mythic Dungeons
description:
Mythic Dungeons is a simple 2.5D Platformer Game.

Inspired by Castlevania HD, this title has arcade-like gameplay with high replayability and easy playability.

It also supports online cooperative play, with up to 10 players.

The multiplayer matching system uses a drop-in - drop-out system, making it easy and convenient to join a multiplayer game.

Mythical dungeon awaits


There is only one rule: Defeat the tough boss at the deepest part of the dungeon within the time limit!

The dungeon is full of monsters and traps.

Survive the dungeon and bring back the treasure!

Four unique classes


Players can choose from four unique classes.

Each class has ample enhancements, including the ability to obtain new equipment, increase skill levels, and upgrade and enchant equipment.

  • Four unique classes
  • Six distinctive levels and six bosses
  • More than 800 equipment and items
  • 37 magic and skills.
  • Over 100 avatar items
  • Online multiplayer for up to 10 players
